snippet: We have entered the age of quantum politics; and Mitt Romney is the first quantum politician.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author David Javerbaum humorously equates Mitt Romney's candidacy to quantum physics, governed by rules that are bizarre and appear to go against everyday experience and common sense.
lead_paragraph: We have entered the age of quantum politics; and Mitt Romney is the first quantum politician.

headline.main: A Quantum Theory of Mitt Romney
headline.print_headline: A Quantum Theory of Mitt Romney
